definition: (lit.) land of fish and rice/(fig.) fertile region/land of milk and honey
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: It is located in the beautiful Tongxiang City, Zhejiang Province, on a rich plain praised as "homeland of fish and rice".
sentences.chinese: 地址坐落在環境秀美的“魚米之鄉”浙江省桐鄉市。

sentences.english: This area enjoys the reputation of a land with milk and honey.
sentences.chinese: 這個地方有魚米之鄉的美譽。

sentences.english: Wuhu is a land of fish and rice. So are other places in this region.
sentences.chinese: 蕪湖是魚米之鄉，該地區的其他地方也是。

sentences.english: Wuxi is a famous land of plenty.
sentences.chinese: 無錫是中國著名的魚米之鄉。

sentences.english: Hunan is a land of fish and rice.
sentences.chinese: 基本資料湖南是魚米之鄉。

sentences.english: I clearly remember that it is a land of fish and rice.
sentences.chinese: 我清楚記得，那是一個魚米之鄉。

sentences.english: The province is traditionally known as the "Land of Fish and Rice".
sentences.chinese: 浙江省在傳統上被稱爲“魚米之鄉”。

sentences.english: Qingpu, a land of fish and rice, lies in the west suburbs of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 青浦是一個魚米之鄉，位於上海的西郊。

sentences.english: Jingjiang is a famous land flowing with milk and honey.
sentences.chinese: 靖江是著名的魚米之鄉。

sentences.english: Hunan is a good district with abundant fish and rice.
sentences.chinese: “湖南是魚米之鄉”用英文怎麼說？

sentences.english: The area is known as "the land of fish and rice".
sentences.chinese: 這個地區是有名的魚米之鄉。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
(bird species of China) black-crowned night heron (Nycticorax nycticorax)
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
Beiguan district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
